recipe_name: Avocado, tomato, feta and brown rice grain bowl
author: Rebecca Sargent
method: Cook the rice according to packet instructions, then drain.  Place the rice in the bowl you plan to eat from. Add the spring onion, tomato, avocado, feta and coriander.  Drizzle liberally with the oil and season with salt and pepper. Eat straight away or pack in your lunchbox ready to take to work.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz brown rice,  1 spring onion, sliced,  1 tomato, sliced,  ½ avocado, sliced,  30g/1oz feta, crumbled,  2 sprigs coriander, leaves picked,  1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
